description:
PyCon APAC 2022｜主題演講 Keynotes｜國泰金控 Cathay Financial Holdings / 美光科技 Micron 冠名贊助

🪧 投影片 Slides：https://github.com/vstinner/talks/blob/main/2022-PyconAPAC/python-incompatible-changes.pdf

🪄 說明 Description 🪄
How does Python introduce incompatible changes? How are projects dealing with them? Reverting a few changes breaking most projects.

🚀 講者介紹 About Speaker - Victor Stinner 🚀
Senior Software Engineer at Red Hat, maintains Python upstream and downstream (RHEL and Fedora). Python core developer since 2010.

#python #pycontw #pyconapac2022
